price: en vez de Él. Confabúlense todos contra mí [si quieren] y no me hagan esperar.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
